data.text:
New York Lt. Gov. Kathy Hochul (D) - a former member of Congress - will replace Andrew Cuomo (D) as NY Gov following his resignation.  
She appeared on C-SPAN @cspanwj Oct. 30, 2018, when she was Cuomo's running-mate, to discuss issues facing New York:

https://t.co/r5XehzvigC https://t.co/nlGcOeOkpH
